about_the_game:
Foreword


  • Spoilers are hidden.
  • Overall, it's more like a memo, and readers shouldn't take it seriously.

  • I use an automatic translation function in the text and in the game. There may be mistakes in the translation. (If so, please point them out.)
  • Original:本文およびゲーム内にて自動翻訳機能を利用しています。翻訳に間違いがある可能性があります。（その場合は指摘してもらえると助かります。）
  • As such, I rarely use language in-game. (The reason for selling to many language-speaking countries is stronger.)
  • Original:そのため、ゲーム内では言語をほとんど使用していません。（多くの言語圏へ販売するための理由の方が強い。）

  • Not so crazy. (current version)
  • Neither monkeys nor gorillas appear. (current version)

About PC specs (probably low specs are acceptable)

Looking at the screenshots, it seems that high specs are required, but surprisingly low specs can be used.
Because it is running on a PC without a graphics board (with built-in GPU) used for game production.

"About This"


What kind of game?

A game where bananas swing around and attack and get blown away!
A game in which zombies dash and attack and get blown away!
A game in which you use items to aim for the goal while hiding behind things, lockers, or objects so that bananas and zombies can't find you.
Physics simulator Banana Zombie Horror Stealth Action.
* Physics: Objects and the like are physically simulated. Zombies, Boss bananas, and Banana balls bounce and blow away with the power of Bananaine!
* Banana: Boss banana is big and swings around and blows it away. There are also banana peel Killer banana. Each banana item.
* Zombie: Rushing at you and blowing you away.
* Horror: Something simple. If the stage is dark and zombies attack, you can call it horror.
* Stealth: Hide behind objects or in lockers to avoid being seen by enemies. If you find it, it will chase you, so run away. Use items and objects to your advantage!
* Action: Jump or run. Grab, carry, place and throw objects. Use items and objects to your advantage!

Extra
"Go Banana(s)" is an idiom that means "going crazy" from the way monkeys get excited in front of bananas!
With such a title, some people might have expected it to be a crazy game.
Unfortunately, it's not that crazy...
But it's a little crazy.
Because bananas attack!
Exactly killer bananas!
Ooh ooh!! (Excitement)
You can deal with bananas by running away, hiding, shooting or throwing them!
Otherwise you will be blown away by the bananas.
How is that?
Well... you'll know when you get blown away.
Ooh ooh!! (Excitement)
"Go Banana" is such a crazy...
Physics simulator!
__________________Banana&Zombie!
________________________________Horror!
_______________________________________Stealth!
_______________________________________________Action!
______________________________________________________Adventure!
Physics simulator Banana&Zombie Horror Stealth Action Adventure!!
Extra large!!
Good deal!!
Ooh ooh ooh!! (Great excitement)

Oh, by the way, in the current version...
Neither monkeys nor gorillas appear.
Ooh ooh!! (Anger)
detailed_description:
Foreword


  • Spoilers are hidden.
  • Overall, it's more like a memo, and readers shouldn't take it seriously.

  • I use an automatic translation function in the text and in the game. There may be mistakes in the translation. (If so, please point them out.)

  • As such, I rarely use language in-game. (The reason for selling to many language-speaking countries is stronger.)
  • Original:そのため、ゲーム内では言語をほとんど使用していません。（多くの言語圏へ販売するための理由の方が強い。）

  • Not so crazy. (current version)
  • Neither monkeys nor gorillas appear. (current version)

Because it is running on a PC without a graphics board (with built-in GPU) used for game production.

name: Go Banana

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-3240 CPU @ 3.40GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Built-in GPU
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: PC specs for operation check

short_description: If you thought, "Wow, another weird game came out...", you're sharp! Feel like you're watching a B-movie, grab some cola and popcorn and get through this silly game! Get ready to throw your mind, time and money down the drain. And now you too, let's Go! Banana! to this crazy world!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Ukrainian*, Dutch*, Greek*, Swedish*, Spanish - Latin America*, Thai*, Czech*, Danish*, Turkish*, Norwegian*, Hungarian*, Finnish*, Bulgarian*, Vietnamese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Polish*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Japanese*, Korean*, Icelandic*, Irish*, Azerbaijani*, Assamese*, Afrikaans*, Amharic*, Albanian*, Armenian*, Igbo*, Indonesian*, Uyghur*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Uzbek*, Urdu*, Estonian*, Odia*, Kazakh*, Catalan*, Kannada*, Galician*, K'iche'*, Kyrgyz*, Khmer*, Croatian*, Gujarati*, Quechua*, Xhosa*, Konkani*, Sindhi*, Sinhala*, Georgian*, Scots*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Swahili*, Zulu*, Serbian*, Sotho*, Sorani*, Tajik*, Tatar*, Tamil*, Dari*, Cherokee*, Tswana*, Tigrinya*, Telugu*, Turkmen*, Nepali*, Hausa*, Basque*, Valencian*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Hindi*, Filipino*, Hebrew*, Belarusian*, Bangla*, Persian*, Bosnian*, Maori*, Macedonian*, Malayalam*, Marathi*, Maltese*, Malay*, Mongolian*, Yoruba*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Kinyarwanda*
*languages with full audio support
